unittitle_ssm: Stephen Somerstein photographs of the 1965 march from Selma to Montgomery
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of 59 photographs by Stephen Somerstein documenting the 1965 Civil Rights March from Selma to Mongomery, AL. There are some color prints, but most are black and white.
corpname_ssm: Selma to Montgomery Rights March (1965 : Selma, Ala.) -- Photographs.
subject_ssm: African Americans  -- Civil rights -- Alabama -- Selma.
African American civil rights workers -- Photographs.
